sourcesContent:
import Musiques from "../Const/musiques" import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import "../../App.css" function MusicPlayer(){ const[musiques,setMusique] = useState(Musiques) const[ActiveMusic,setActive]= useState(musiques[0]) const[AudioMusic,setAudio]=useState(new Audio (Musiques[0].url)) function setActiveAudio(song){ Pause() setActive(song) setAudio(new Audio(song.url)) } function Play(){ AudioMusic.play() console.log(AudioMusic.textTracks) } function Pause(){ AudioMusic.pause() } return(

{ActiveMusic.titre}

{new Date(AudioMusic.currentTime).getTime()}/{new Date(AudioMusic.duration).getMinutes()}:{new Date(AudioMusic.duration).getSeconds()}

{ musiques.map((e,i)=>
setActiveAudio(e)}>

{e.titre}

) }
) } export default MusicPlayer
